name: Ocean Deep Dreams
description:
You play as a fish who dreams of reaching the top of the surface.

In these dreams, you eat what is below you in the food chain and evolve, letting you rise closer to the surface safely.

Those which are currently your threats may later become food!

Note: If enemies are aggressively chasing you, try swimming away to a lower depth - as you evolve larger creatures will begin to stop seeing you as prey.

There is a spawn-camping issue on respawn which can be mitigated by rapidly swimming away to the right. Apologies for this, I will try to fix this at the weekend.

Controls

This game has gamepad support.

Keyboard & Mouse

A,D / 🠤🠦 arrows to rotate.
W / Space / Left Click / 🠥 to swim.
ESC to pause.

Gamepad

Left stick to rotate.
A/Cross to swim.
Menu/Options to pause.
